errors.message: Split amount is more than is staked
errors.name: insufficientStake

errors.message: Stake account with transient stake cannot be merged
errors.name: mergeTransientStake

errors.message: Stake account merge failed due to different authority, lockups or state
errors.name: mergeMismatch

errors.message: Insufficient voting activity in the reference vote account
errors.name: insufficientReferenceVotes

errors.message: Stake account is not delegated to the provided vote account
errors.name: voteAddressMismatch

errors.message: Stake account has not been delinquent for the minimum epochs required for deactivation
errors.name: minimumDelinquentEpochsForDeactivationNotMet

errors.message: Delegation amount is less than the minimum
errors.name: insufficientDelegation

errors.message: Stake account with transient or inactive stake cannot be redelegated
errors.name: redelegateTransientOrInactiveStake

errors.message: Stake redelegation to the same vote account is not permitted
errors.name: redelegateToSameVoteAccount

errors.message: Redelegated stake must be fully activated before deactivation
errors.name: redelegatedStakeMustFullyActivateBeforeDeactivationIsPermitted

errors.message: Stake action is not permitted while the epoch rewards period is active
errors.name: epochRewardsActive

docs: Stake history sysvar that carries stake warmup/cooldown history
